title: New Ashe Best Build

replies.body:
I build hurricane with bork on her as is so I already know that build is going to be "THE" build.

Question, how does new Ashe scale with Crit Damage? I'm curious for many reasons because if she doesn't then IE wont be as good as other items on her. If she does scale it I wonder if crit damage runes will be a thing for her.
please go read the information with numbers for how crit works released by riot already.

Where is the information on crit damage? I understand building crit chance increases the bonus damage but how does building crit damage effect her? Does it scale according to her new base 1.1 crit damage? How does IE bonus work on this? Does it only apply to the bonus damage or full?

cant find the article where they list numbers and interactions, might of been a red post.

man reading must be hard for you. Post what ever you want at this point. It is obvious that brains is not required for high elo.

> [{quoted}](name=Kaosu Desu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I0Wkmoai,comment-id=0005000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-13T22:10:48.902+0000)
>
> man reading must be hard for you. Post what ever you want at this point. It is obvious that brains is not required for high elo.

If it's there then tell me the answer, if you can't then it is not there and you are ignorant.

Ashe passive critical damge formula:

> Passive - Frost Shots 
> Permaslow moved from Q to Passive.
> Slow strength scales with character level
> Ashe no longer has a chance to crit. She never crits targets that don't have her passive on them, but always crits targets that do have it for (math stuff below, since I know people will ask or be confused): 
> (TotalAD)x1.1+(TotalAD)x((CritChanceStat)x(1+(CritDamageStat)))
> Let's say Ashe has IE, PD, and 200AD. Under this model, she deals 385 damage (200x1.1+200x.55x1.5).
> With an IE and 100% Crit, she deals her ADx2.6 on targets with her passive on them.
> Etc.

Here is the source:

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/6BBcWPLy-ashe-update-feedback-thread
I was honestly wanting to trying that exact build when rework hits live
Yep, you can try some differents build, actually I trying different and that's the best build that I found... Myabe you feel that another kind of build is better.

TBH I see Ashe using a standard ADC build with the exception of now building a Black Cleaver.  I guess I might see a Runnaas build if you are against a bunch of tanks and you have a lot of AD on your team, like Vi jungle Zed mid Riven top or something, but in a normal team comp that does equal magic and physical damage I don't see a reason to build hurricane on Ashe.

{{item:3085}} is now a core item, I don't doubt about that... 

* with 2 single basic attacks you charge the 5 stacks of your Q.
* can put the slow on all the enemy team in the team fights very easily.
* with the flurry attack charged you launch 15 attacks per attack.
* The charged flurry attack have a limited time of 4 seconds, so more atk spd more flurry attacks and 70% is amazing on her.
* Combined with {{item:3071}} shred all the enemy team armor very easily too.

I don't see why not build this on her, she's the utility support so Runnan Hurricane is perfect to help her to fit the rol.

1--Using your W correctly will charge your Q by itself.
2--W applies your slow just as easily and you don't sacrifice damage.
3--No its not 15 attacks because the flurry bolts don't do the damage of an actual attack.  The extra bolts are not gonna make up for having zero combat stats other than atk speed on the item.
4--Statikk/PD/Botrk are all.better buys when it comes to atk speed.  They provide mor.ve speed, they provide crit which directly increases the damage of all her AAs, or Botrk give a tank shredding effect.  All of them out class hurricane.
5--She will shred armor just fine without it and you don't need to shred the armor of the entire team, generally its just 1-2 tanks/off tanks which you can easily do without hurricane while getting far more damage from other items.

Really if your not playing Kayle you shouldn't be buying hurricane, even Kalistas are starting to realize the standard ADC build is better than hurricane builds.  Hurricane simply doesn't give enough to be worth it compared to other items that are far better.
I respect your opinion bit don't share it. Runnan Hurricane is a great item on her regardless you say.

Eh your free to disagree with me, and frankly I would love to be wrong if for no other reason than to get some unique builds out of ADCs in bot lane...sadly I feel play testing is only going to prove me right in the end.

I´m really looking forward to try:
{{item:3085}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3035}}  So riddiculos, but it may actually work. xD

Without boots?

Manamune and Essence Reaver don't look like good items on her, She don't need tons of mana to succed in the game.

Well IF Ashe´s Multiple-Hits proc One-Hit Effects, or at least count as "single Target Attacks" (i dont know thats why i want to try this) every single Hit will proc Muramana as well! Besides dealing Tons of DMG this will consume tons of Mana - thats why Reaver. :P 
And Boots? Well ofc you need boots - still in Lategame there are scenarios you can sell your boots for more DPS. ^^
Interesting!

Given her new Q I think TBC will be really good, especially because her ult is a large portion of her power and 20% CDR is niiice. 

Not sure if a no critical build will be any good on her. Gonna have to play around for a bit.
{{item:3087}} is good on her and {{item:3071}} is totally a huge item on her too. Yeah its very funny make experimentals builds on her.

I've thought about this build. I don't have a PBE account, but I think it has some serious potential. With Runnan's, Black Cleaver, and her Q she can shred a lot of armor on the enemy team. You would be sacrificing some single target damage for the build, but I think there's a place for this build to be utilized. Especially if you have more AD on your team.

She atk very very fast with that build, And to have your Q very fast too (every 6.5s with 40cd). With Runnan Hurricane and Black Cleaver you are solwing and shreeding armor to all the enemy team. Also Btrok proc on every normal aa. Your AD is not bad at all (she have the perma atk spd boost of the mastery tree because every hot is crit) so she deals a more normal dmg, I want to know news effectively builst too.
nice bronze build!
Bronze Build? Can you please deep more in your thoughts?
